owl:Ontology.dct:title: Incident Response Ontology
owl:Ontology.dct:description: An ontology for modeling cybersecurity incident response processes
owl:Ontology.dct:creator: Haula Galadima, Cormac Doherty, Rob Brennan

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Incident
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A security incident that requires investigation and response.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Artefact
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An observable piece of evidence collected from an incident.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Course of Action
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A planned response action to a security incident.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Detection
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Activities in detection of security incidents.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Containment
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Actions to limit the spread and impact of an incident.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Eradication
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Actions to remove threats and root causes from affected systems.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Recovery
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Actions to restore systems to normal operation.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Post-Incident Activity
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Activities conducted after incident resolution (e.g., lessons learned, reporting).

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Analyst
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A security analyst who investigates and responds to incidents.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Tier 1
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: First responder performing initial triage and categorization.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Tier 2
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Incident responder handling deeper investigation and analysis.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Tier 3
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Senior analyst or subject matter expert handling complex investigations.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Security Event
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An observable occurrence relevant to system security (e.g., alert from SIEM, IDS).

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Security Event Action
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A specific action taken or observed within a security event.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Security Analysis
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The analysis of observables from security events leading to an incident

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Responder Communication
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Communication between incident responders during an investigation.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has event
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links an incident to one or more related security events that triggered or are part of it.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has artefact
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links an incident to related artefacts/observables collected during the investigation.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has course of action
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links an incident to the response actions (COA) taken to resolve it.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has analysis
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links an incident to the security analyses performed on it.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has confirmation analyst
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links an incident to the analyst who confirmed it as a genuine security incident.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has COA creation analyst
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a course of action to the analyst who created or planned it.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has COA assigned analyst
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a course of action to the analyst responsible for executing it.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has artefact creation analyst
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links an artefact to the analyst who collected, created, or documented it.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has analysis performing analyst
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a security analysis to the analyst who performed it.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has chat analyst
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a communication to the analyst who made the chat.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: pertains to incident
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a chat to the incident it discusses.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: was generated by
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the security event that generated this analysis

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: was performed by
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the analyst who performed this activity

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: was associated with
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates association with an incident

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: used
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates that a course of action used specific analysis

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is event of
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Inverse of hasEvent. Links a security event back to its parent incident.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is artefact of
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Inverse of hasArtefact. Links an artefact back to its incident.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is COA of
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Inverse of hasCoa. Links a course of action back to its incident.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is analysis of
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Inverse of hasAnalysis. Links an analysis back to its incident.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: confirmed incident
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Inverse of hasConfirmationAnalyst. Links an analyst to the incidents they confirmed.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: created COA
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Inverse of hasCoaCreationAnalyst. Links an analyst to the courses of action they created.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: assigned to COA
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Inverse of hasCoaAssignedAnalyst. Links an analyst to the courses of action they are assigned to execute.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: created artefact
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Inverse of hasArtefactCreationAnalyst. Links an analyst to the artefacts they created.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: performed analysis
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Inverse of hasAnalysisPerformingAnalyst. Links an analyst to the analyses they performed.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: generated chat
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Inverse of hasChatAnalyst. Links an analyst to the chat they generated.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has pertaining chat
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Inverse of pertainsToIncident. Links an incident to a chat about it.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: generated
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Inverse of prov:wasGeneratedBy. Indicates a security event generated an analysis.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: performed
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Inverse of prov:wasPerformedBy. Indicates an analyst performed an activity.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: had associated entity
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Inverse of prov:wasAssociatedWith. Indicates an incident had an associated entity.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: was used by
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Inverse of prov:used. Indicates an analysis was used by a course of action.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has artefact creation datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Timestamp when the artefact was collected.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has artefact type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Classification of the artefact.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has artefact data value
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The actual content or value of the artefact .

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has COA creation datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Timestamp when the course of action was created.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has COA description
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Narrative description of the course of action and its intended effect.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has COA status
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current execution status of the course of action.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has COA start datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Timestamp when execution of the course of action was initiated.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has COA end datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Timestamp when execution of the course of action was completed.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has incident ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier for an incident.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has incident severity
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The severity level of an incident (Low, Medium, High, Critical).

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has confirmation datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Timestamp when the incident was confirmed

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has incident description
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Detailed description of an incident.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has end datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Timestamp when incident response was formally concluded.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has incident name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Title of the incident.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has incident creation datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Timestamp when the incident record was first created.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has incident stage
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current stage in the incident lifecycle.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has incident status
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current status of the incident.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has analyst ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier for an analyst.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has analyst email
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Email address of the analyst.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has event ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier for a security event.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has event title
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Short description or name for the security event.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has event description
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Detailed description of the security event.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has event activity
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of the specific activity within a security event.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has event activity datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Timestamp when the specific security event activity occurred.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has security analysis data type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The type of analysis performed.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has security analysis data value
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The data value to be analysed.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has security analysis datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Timestamp when the security analysis was performed.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has security analysis details
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Detailed findings from the analysis.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has chat message
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The content or body of the communication message.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has chat message datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Timestamp when the communication occurred.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has chat sentiment
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The sentiment or tone of the communication.
